settings.name: Manikandan K
settings.title: Aspiring Software Engineer
settings.summary: Aspiring software engineer passionate about building user-focused applications and solving real-world problems with web development and machine learning.

about.title: About Me
about.content: Experienced in academic projects involving web development and basic machine learning. Eager to learn, collaborate, and contribute to impactful software solutions. I am passionate about building user-focused applications and solving real-world problems. I am a quick learner and always looking for new challenges.

items.description: Contributed to the development of web applications by building reusable UI components and integrating third-party REST APIs. Improved user interface responsiveness and cross-browser compatibility. Collaborated in an Agile team using Git for version control.

items.title: Sign Language to Text/Speech Translator (SIH 2024)
items.description: Built an AI-powered tool to convert American Sign Language (ASL) hand gestures into real-time text and speech, aimed at bridging the communication gap for the hearing-impaired. Utilized hand landmark tracking and custom-trained classifiers to recognize gestures with over 90% accuracy. Integrated into a web interface for accessibility and tested with various dynamic and static signs.

items.title: Smart Crop Protection System (IITMIC 2023)
items.description: Designed and implemented a sensor-based system that detects birds or animals and activates scare mechanisms to protect farmlands. The model was built for rural scalability and presented at IITMIC.

items.title: Weather Monitoring Web App
items.description: Developed a real-time weather dashboard using public APIs. Users can search by location and get responsive weather data with visuals. Optimized frontend for smooth performance and cross-device compatibility.

items.institution: PSNA College of Engineering and Technology
